steps: Check if you need a membership to access ticket sales.
Create an account on the club’s official ticket website.
Add your payment method and verify your identity if required.
At the sale time, enter the official link and select your seat or section.
Complete the purchase and save the confirmation email.
notes: For high-demand matches (like El Clásico), the virtual queue may open 10–30 minutes earlier.
